[ti:Triggered(freestyle) (Explicit)]

[al:Triggered (freestyle)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Triggered(freestyle) (Explicit) - Jhené Aiko
[00:06.39]Lyrics by：Jhene Aiko Chilombo/Brian Keith Warfield/Maclean Robinson/Julian-Quan Viet Le/Ross James
[00:12.79]Composed by：Jhene Aiko Chilombo/Brian Keith Warfield/Maclean Robinson/Julian-Quan Viet Le/Ross James
[00:19.19]Go figure
[00:21.27]You were the trigger
[00:23.51]You brought me to an obstructed view
[00:26.24]When you knew the picture was bigger
[00:28.66]Who am I kiddin'
[00:30.70]Knew from the beginning
[00:33.16]You'd ruin everything you do it every time
[00:35.81]You are my enemy you are no friend of mind muhf**ker
[00:40.35]You muhf**kin' right
[00:42.12]You muhf**kin' right I'm bitter
[00:44.51]You muhf**kin' right I'm triggered
[00:46.90]You muhf**kin' right I
[00:49.39]Wanna f**k you right now
[00:51.63]I just turned the lights out now
[00:54.00]And you know when the sun go down
[00:55.95]That's when it would all go down
[00:58.11]Been a minute been a while
[00:59.98]Ain't let nobody hit it since you hit it
[01:02.68]You know you always know what to do wit' it
[01:04.88]But ain't no me and you without you in it
[01:07.04]D**n I'm 'bout to burn this b***h down
[01:09.42]I think I need to lie down
[01:11.87]'Cause I'm not tryna wild out now
[01:14.90]But right now
[01:16.85]Don't know what I'm capable of love
[01:18.97]Might f**k around and go crazy on cuz
[01:21.38]Might f**k around have to pay me in blood
[01:24.10]This ain't the way that you want it
[01:25.95]Might catch a case in this b***h
[01:27.81]Don't let me catch you face-to-face in this b***h
[01:30.11]Tryin' my hardest not to disrespect you
[01:32.73]After what you did man what you expected
[01:35.45]You muhf**ker
[01:37.83]You muhf**kin' right
[01:39.64]You muhf**kin' right I'm bitter
[01:42.11]You muhf**kin' right I'm triggered
[01:44.61]You muhf**kin' right I
[01:47.08]Tryna let the time fly
[01:48.80]Yeah
[01:49.40]Tryna let the time go by
[01:51.70]Tryna let the time heal all
[01:53.54]Tryna let the time kill all
[01:55.39]Of our memories
[01:57.76]All you meant to me
[02:00.09]All that history
[02:02.48]All that's history
[02:04.79]I'll calm down eventually
[02:07.41]Fall back eventually please
[02:09.99]Call me back eventually
[02:12.47]Fall back into me yeah
[02:15.29]Maybe I'm overreacting
[02:17.02]Baby I don't know what happened
[02:18.84]You know all of my bad habits
[02:20.56]You know it's hard for me to control that s**t man
[02:23.22]'Cause when I get mad I get big mad
[02:26.04]Should have never did that get back
[02:28.29]'Bout to feel the wrath of a menace
[02:29.91]In my bag in my feelings
[02:31.14]I'm a bad lil' b***h and uh
[02:33.40]I'm triggered when I see your face
[02:36.21]Triggered when I hear your name
[02:38.53]Triggered I am not okay
[02:41.64]You need to stay out my way
[02:43.47]I'm triggered when I see your face
[02:45.75]Triggered when I hear your name
[02:48.17]Triggered I am not okay
[02:50.78]Yeah
[02:51.28]You need to stay out of my way
[02:55.92]You need to stay out of my way
[02:59.71]Yeah
[03:00.73]You need to stay out of my way yeah
[03:05.88]Oh oh-oh-oh ayy yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Triggered(freestyle) (Explicit)]
[ar:Jhené Aiko]
[al:Triggered (freestyle)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.39]//
[00:12.79]//
[00:19.19]想想看
[00:21.27]你牵动着我的心
[00:23.51]让我打开了新世界的大门
[00:26.24]你知道 那里的天地更加广阔
[00:28.66]我怎么会开玩笑
[00:30.70]从一开始就知道
[00:33.16]你会毁了我的一切 每次都是这样
[00:35.81]你是我的敌人 你不是真正的朋友
[00:40.35]你是对的
[00:42.12]你是对的 我很痛苦
[00:44.51]你是对的 我动情了
[00:46.90]你是对的 我
[00:49.39]想要立刻和你缠绵一番
[00:51.63]我刚把灯关了
[00:54.00]你知道太阳何时落下
[00:55.95]那时一切都会安静下来
[00:58.11]过了一分钟 又过了一会儿
[00:59.98]没有人能像你一样让我快乐
[01:02.68]你最清楚应该怎么撩我
[01:04.88]失去了你 一切都没有意义
[01:07.04]我热情似火 难以克制
[01:09.42]我想我需要躺下
[01:11.87]因为我不想让自己太疯狂
[01:14.90]但是现在
[01:16.85]不知道我还能爱什么
[01:18.97]也许会疯狂一次 放纵自己
[01:21.38]也许会疯狂一次 必须补偿我
[01:24.10]这不是你想的那样
[01:25.95]可能会惹祸上身
[01:27.81]不要让我和你见面
[01:30.11]尽我最大的努力不去招惹你
[01:32.73]看看你做了些什么 你还有什么可期待的
[01:35.45]你
[01:37.83]你是对的
[01:39.64]你是对的 我很痛苦
[01:42.11]你是对的 我动情了
[01:44.61]你是对的 我
[01:47.08]让时间匆匆流逝
[01:48.80]//
[01:49.40]让时间匆匆流逝
[01:51.70]试着让时间治愈一切
[01:53.54]试着让时间磨灭所有
[01:55.39]关于我们的记忆
[01:57.76]你对我而言
[02:00.09]只是过去式
[02:02.48]只是一段回忆
[02:04.79]我最终会冷静下来
[02:07.41]最终会放弃 拜托
[02:09.99]记得给我回个电话
[02:12.47]回到我身边
[02:15.29]也许是我反应过度
[02:17.02]宝贝 我不知道发生了什么
[02:18.84]你知道我所有的坏习惯
[02:20.56]你知道 我也控制不住自己
[02:23.22]因为我生气时 总是不顾一切
[02:26.04]应该都回不去了吧
[02:28.29]这一切都是愤怒惹的祸
[02:29.91]在我的心里 在我的认知里
[02:31.14]我是个坏女人
[02:33.40]一看见你的脸 我就会动情
[02:36.21]一听见你的名字 我就会动情
[02:38.53]情到深处 我现在很难过
[02:41.64]你还是离我远点吧
[02:43.47]一看见你的脸 我就会动情
[02:45.75]一听见你的名字 我就会动情
[02:48.17]情到深处 我现在很难过
[02:50.78]//
[02:51.28]你还是离我远点吧
[02:55.92]你还是离我远点吧
[02:59.71]//
[03:00.73]你还是离我远点吧
[03:05.88]//
